MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G65 postcode area of Kilsyth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:33pm. Our team are on site carrying out safety inspections from the Arden Grove substation whilst we wait on additional resources to arrive on site. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:43pm on Satuday 20th March 2021
